bug.author: zjzhengyin
bug.description: Hello！When I follow The instructions in the document “OpenPose Library - Standalone Face Or Hand Keypoint Detector“ to use the command ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --body_disable --face --face_detector 1 .There is a error:unknown command line flag 'body_disable' . How to solve this problem?

comments.comment: Typo in the doc! Please, use body 0 rather than body_disable. I will fix it in the official doc soon! Best
